fields.name: ActualID
fields.description: Unique identifier for each actual data entry

fields.name: CostCenter
fields.description: Cost center for which the actual data is reported

fields.name: MonthYear
fields.description: Month and year of the actual data

tables.description: Table to store actual financial data

notes: The Users table is related to the Forecasts table through the UserID field. This allows us to track which user uploaded each forecast. The Forecasts and Actuals tables can be joined on the CostCenter and MonthYear fields to compare forecasted and actual financial data. The database model is normalized to reduce data redundancy and improve data integrity.
